selected_reference.why: Canonical workflow execution command doc for this command; used as oracle for gap analysis.

reference_slash_docs.why: Upstream planner that sets executionContext and invokes lite-execute in --in-memory mode.
Related executor pattern for routing tasks to Agent vs CLI; includes prompt builders and resume IDs.
Another command that builds executionContext; useful for shared data-shape conventions.
Post-execution remediation workflow; informs review/fix-plan expectations.

reference_ts.why: Loads workflow command markdown and frontmatter metadata (name/description/allowed-tools/argument-hint).

anchors: console.error('[Commands] Error reading commands config:', error);
reference_ts.why: Discovers and lists available commands (.md and .md.disabled) in project and user scopes.
Underlying CLI execution and resume/merge behavior that lite-execute delegates to via 'ccw cli'.
